value: 54 Mile scenic drive in Oklahoma and Arkansas along the ridge of the Ouachita Mountains and the Ouachita National Forest.

While you are in Talihina, be sure and visit the Historical Downtown.  Visit Cranford's Boots for a true old fashioned boot store with some of the best prices around.  Nothing fancy, just good boots at great prices!  Another old time treat is "Treats and Treasures Old Fashioned Soda Fountain".  This 1940's Soda Fountain is like stepping back into time.  They have the best Milkshakes and Malts in town and still make ice cream soda's.  Some say their hamburgers are the best in town!!!

There are several great places to eat in Talihina.  Larger groups may want to call ahead for reservations.  Our small town will do our best to accommodate you.
